medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient had dinner last night and suddenly felt flush and warm in the evening. Symptoms progressed to mild nausea, anorexia, chills, and a temperature of 100.4. Pain developed that eventually localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Walking exacerbates the pain. Patient has never experienced similar symptoms before and had one normal bowel movement this evening.
medical_history.family_history: Positive for diabetes in father, maternal and paternal grandmothers; hypertension in mother, father, maternal grandmother, and brother; history of lymphoma and lung cancer in mother.
